name: Credit Card Application Management System SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Credit Card Application Management System Credit Card Application Management System 1.0"]
description: Credit Card Application Management System是一个信用卡申请管理系统。Credit Card Application Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/admin/index.php中参数Username缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
